data.text: @Mike69624634 @nzherald They need to be extended until the end of the year just to piss people off.
@SpearoNz50 @nzherald I haven't watched non-sports shows at 6 pm since the 2000s

@nzherald What this guy does is comparable to continually yelling fire in a crowded cinema.....yet people keep listening and publishing his misinformation. Who will be held to account for the harm caused? @nzherald , you are the ones giving this fearmonger a platform, stop.

@nzherald Just what NZ needs, another hot take from the guy whose reliable record for being wildly off the mark and inaccurate is only matched by his hysterical over-reactions.

Considering all the mandates being dropped overseas Baker appears not to know what he's talking about.

@nzherald Is this the guy who said we would have tens of thousands of deaths and it was gonna be this massive catastrophe??
🤷‍♂️
@nzherald Wonder how much the government is paying this muppet!?
@nzherald Yh coz this guys been so accurate so far
